strapiPost.title: Coler Mountain Bike Preserve Celebrates Grand Opening Of The Rise
strapiPost.content:
All are welcome to join Coler Mountain Bike Preserve on Friday, Nov 18 as they celebrate the grand opening of The Rise, a 185-step steel and cedar staircase inspired by workout stairs in Santa Monica. 

  • Rise and shine: The day will begin at 7a with an address by Debra Layton, Executive Director of Peel Compton Foundation, followed by an inaugural ascent of the stairs by local running groups and Airship Cafe serving up specialty drinks. Later, join Sunny Days for a celebration at 4p including a DJ set and specialty mocktails. 
  • Getting there: The Rise can be accessed from the North lot at 11840-11850 Peach Orchard Rd in Bentonville, or from any parking lot via the Applegate Trail between SW 8th St and NW 3rd St. 

Keep up with happenings at Coler Mountain Bike Preserve HERE.
